author: bloritsch
msg: Updated web.xml to include a default classpath-attribute parameter and instructions
for WebSphere, Resin, or Catalina (defaults to Tomcat).

author: bloritsch
msg: Make the classpath attribute determinable at servlet init time.  The parameter is "classpath-attribute".
Please be certain to define this in your servlet init parameters.

author: dims
msg: Use System.out if logfile is not specified.
